title: Replace incorrect phone number site-wide

requirements.text: Replace the incorrect phone number "(844) 527-3733" with "(781) 227-0994" across the entire website by updating the centralized business phone constants (including both the displayed format and the tel: digits), and ensure no remaining UI text or links still reference the old number.

quotes: Phone number is still wrong. Please replace "(844) 527-3733" with "(781) 227-0994".

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts, businessInfo.phone.display is "(781) 227-0994" and businessInfo.phone.tel is "7812270994".
All rendered phone links (e.g., footer and contact page) display "(781) 227-0994" and use href="tel:7812270994".
The string "(844) 527-3733" does not appear anywhere in the frontend source or rendered pages.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui components are read-only).
Backend is not required for this change.
nonGoals: Updating email address, service area, hours, or social links.
Changing the contact form behavior beyond reflecting the correct phone number in the UI.
